post:
StarryDNS aims to provide reliable and high performance hosting services. Our KVM plans in Hong Kong, Singapore, Japan (Tokyo & Osaka) starts from $7 with coupon code **LET30**.

All plans include
- Full Root Access
- Enterprise Hardware
- Tier 3 Datacentre
- Premium Network Transits and Peers
- 1 Dedicated IPv4 Address
- Up to 8 usable IPv6 Address in a dedicated /64
- Free Directadmin
- BGP Session Upon Request


== KVM-1GB plan ==
1 CPU
1 GB RAM
20 GB HDD
1 IP
100 Mbps Bandwidth
500 GB Traffic
$7 / Month with coupon code **LET30**

Click Location to Order
[== Hong Kong ==](https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=432)
[== Singapore ==](https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=561)
[== Japan ==](https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=570)


For test IP and looking glass, please refer to https://www.starrydns.com/en/speedtest


Our payment methods include
- Paypal
- Credit Card (Stripe)
- Bank Transfer


Please read before you order
- Upon signup you agree to our [ToS](https://www.starrydns.com/tos) and [AUP](https://www.starrydns.com/aup). No SPAM, DDoS, hacking or any other unlawful activities. No porn, gambling, phishing, fraud or other unlawful contents.
- Manual review is required for orders by new customers (No instant setup), which can take up to 24 hours.
- 3 days money back guarantee for monthly plan.

Contact Us:
- [Open A Support Ticket](https://my.starrydns.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1)
- Email: service@starrydns.com

Thank you.
